snippet: Yaser Abdel Said, 57, was placed on the Ten Most Wanted list by the F.B.I. in connection with the killing of his two teenage daughters seven years ago in the Dallas area.
abstract: Federal Bureau of Investigation puts fugitive Yaser Abdel Said on its Ten Most Wanted list, saying he is suspect in slaying of his two teenage daughters in Dallas area in 2007.
lead_paragraph: Yaser Abdel Said, 57, was placed on the Ten Most Wanted list by the F.B.I. in connection with the killing of his two teenage daughters seven years ago in the Dallas area.

headline.main: F.B.I. Is Adding Slayings Suspect to Wanted List
headline.print_headline: F.B.I. Is Adding Slayings Suspect to Wanted List
